title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
EB: The Combo should take focus when clicked on, even without dropping down the combo list.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application 
2. Locate the first Combo 
3. Click on the first Combo and observe that it does not take focus
